Tests general layer tree model functionality
Initial layer tree
#document (6)
    iframe#frame (7)
        #document 200x200 (8)
            div#subframe1 80x80 (9)
    div#a 200x200 (7)
        div#b1 100x150 (8)
        div#b2 110x140 (8)
            div#c 90x100 (9)
        div#b3 110x140 (8)

            div#c 90x100 (9)
                div#b1 100x150
        div#b4 0x0
